product_name: The North Face Grizzly Jacket - Men's
long_description: Inspired by the fur of a bear, Polartec(R) Thermal Pro Grizzly high-loft fleece gives The North Face Grizzly jacket an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio and packability for backcountry adventures. Like animal fur, Grizzly polyester fleece uses a combination of textured and non-textured yarns, and long- and short-pile heights to trap warm air close to the body. Stretch panels at collar, back neck, gussets and cuffs let you move freely in The North Face Grizzly jacket. Hem cinch cord with internal pocket adjustment. The North Face Grizzly jacket has two zippered hand pockets and one chest pocket.
short_description: Inspired by the fur of a bear, Polartec(R) Thermal Pro Grizzly high-loft fleece gives The North Face Grizzly jacket an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio and packability for backcountry adventures.
